body.p: Last week had pretty bad time when come to town to ride Otto Franz horse in big parade. First place had feathers and Indian clothes and horse didn’t like it very much and when stop parade to let people that come slow catch up horse got pretty wild and don’t like to stand still and make lot of trouble. I though throw me off but I ride like when I was young fellow in circus and stay on horse and he go up on hind legs and get me over in bushes and get head feathers caught in brush and have pretty bad time for a while and horse go to barn and leave parade. Maybe horse go mad because band long way back and people didn’t know horse and Indian reporter was in parade. Everything too much stretch out and should have band first thing in parade – like circus parade and then horse hear music and like to be in parade and don’t run to barn - like Indian reporter have last Thursday. Next time reporter come to town early and tell Libke where to have band in parade and want different horse too. I told you before about no more frost this year and last night was outdoors and saw night hawk and that sure Indian sign that frost all over and never have anymore harm from frost this year. Indian always wait for night hawk before plant things that frost hurt and do same thing every year and never been fooled yet. Indian reporter want to tell folks that wet moon going to be here on May 25 and Indian signs show going to have plenty rain in June. Indian wet moon is tip like show on calendar for May 25 and white man say same thing dry moon. Indian say moon tip like man bend over to keep rain off face and chest like when out in rain and stoop over like. White man say same moon dry moon because bottom of moon tip up like and water can’t run out and won’t have any rain much when moon is like that. Indian reporter watch this for long time and pretty near every time white man wrong and May 25 moon going to be wet and have more rain. Joe Christman tell Indian reporter give me good suit of clothes if I make it rain and say other farmers do same thing because everything awful dry and grass all burn up. Some Indian tribe all go to one place and pray and sing and beat tom-tom and Winnebago just go one Indian by himself and face west on high hill and sing and beat tom-tom and that way make rain. Maybe Indian reporter take Joe Christman up on suit only one day had to have money for gas and sold tom-tom to Siderstrom big boss at Light and Power Company for $3 and now he have tom-tom and when I see Joe Christman I tell him maybe Soderstrom go out on high hill and beat tom-tom and sing song and make rain for farmers. Was out in woods one day just walking around and saw only about half different kinds of birds I used to see. Saw lots of snakes and come on to big pines snake and follow him and watch where he go and pretty soon he go into bunch of dead grass and I go up and don’t make any noise and see him take three eggs from bird nest and that’s one thing why we don’t have many birds anymore and only way to get rid of snakes that eat birds eggs and kill young birds is to have bounty and then people go out in woods and kill snakes. Another thing I want to tell is about poison that people put out to kill grasshoppers. Same year that everybody put out poison see lots of dead birds and pretty sure poison kill birds too. .
